about.details:
Founded in 2012, Esconet Technologies Limited provides high-end supercomputing solutions, and data center facilities that include storage servers, network security, virtualization, and data protection.

The company offers Servers and Graphics Workstations, Comprehensive Data Storage Solutions, Virtualization Software, Backup and Disaster Recovery Solutions, Data Centre and Access Networks, Advanced Software Defined Networks, Network Security Tools, Email Communication Systems, Databases with High Availability, and Log Management and Analytics Software.

The company also provides service and after-sales services which include IT Hardware Installation & Configuration, Deployment and Seamless Integration of Diverse IT Infrastructure Software, Infrastructure Management & Monitoring, Expertise in Private Cloud Setup and Management, Annual Maintenance Services, Managed Backup and Disaster Recovery Solutions, Data Migration Services, and Expert Consulting Services.

The company also offers cloud-based services through its subsidiary ZeaCloud Services catering to various business needs, e.g. disaster recovery services, managed cloud services, private cloud, and DaaS services.

Esconet's clients include Ministry of Defence, National Informatics Centre-MeitY, National Informatics Centre Services Inc - MeitY, Indian Institute of Technology, Indraprastha Institute of Technology Limited, Bharat Electronics Limited, Oil & Natural Gas Commission Limited, Engineers India Limited and Hindustan National Glass & Industries Limited and many more.

As at November 30, 2023, the company had over 47 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Esconet Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer:
Esconet Technologies IPO is a SME IPO of 3360000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹28.22 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹84 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on February 16, 2024, and closes on February 20, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Esconet Technologies IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Esconet Technologies IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Esconet Technologies IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Esconet Technologies IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Esconet Technologies IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: How to apply for Esconet Technologies IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Esconet Technologies IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Esconet Technologies IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Esconet Technologies IPO will be done on Wednesday, February 21, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, February 22, 2024. Check the Esconet Technologies IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Esconet Technologies IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Esconet Technologies IPO listing date is on Friday, February 23, 2024.
